named-query.name: Exemplar.findByItemAcervo
named-query.query: select e from Exemplar e where e.itemAcervo.id = :idItemAcervo

named-query.name: Fasciculo.findByPeriodico
named-query.query: select f from Fasciculo f WHERE f.periodico.id = :idPeriodico order by f.ano desc, f.mes desc

named-query.name: Fasciculo.contarTodosByPeriodico
named-query.query: select count(f) from Fasciculo f WHERE f.periodico.id = :idPeriodico
